dmca.title: Individual complains blog posted content from stolen handheld
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern 
April 4, 2006 

I have discovered certain content on the Blogger site. This content is the intellectual property of [private], and is protected by Section 36 of the Copyright Act 1968 (Cth).  The entire content on the site http://whois-j-o.blogspot.com / was illegally or unlawfully obtained from a handheld computer that was stolen from my personal possessions in May 2005. 
I request that you remove the files located at the following 

URL: 
http://whois-j-o.blogspot.com/ 

Please respond within three days to [private]@gmail.com with your intent to comply with this request. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an excusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Sincerely, 
[private]
